Versions of external components
-------------------------------

This file lists versions of the external components we are using.

POCO: 1.10.1
boost: 1.72.0
frhed: 0.10904.2017.6
freeimage: 3.18.0
WinIMerge: 1.0.31.0
Google C++ Testing Framework: 1.11.0
GnuWin32 Patch for Windows: 2.5.9-7
7-zip: 21.07
LibXDiff: 611e42a on Nov 2, 2018 (https://github.com/git/git/tree/master/xdiff)
html-tidy5: 5.4.0
jq: 1.4
wil: 209ff9c7e30e71bf6d1405557bf78544920f8157 on Sep 9, 2021
